doc:
Clarence Nash https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clarence_Nash 0 Clarence Charles "Ducky" Nash (December 7, 1904 – February 20, 1985) was an American voice actor. He was best known for the Disney cartoon character Donald Duck, whose distinctive voice he provided for 51 years, also known as the voice of Daisy Duck in 1940. He was born in the rural community of Watonga, Oklahoma, and a street in that town is named in his honor. In 1993, he was posthumously made a Disney Legend for his contributions to Walt Disney films. Clarence_Charles_"_Ducky_"_Nash ( December_7_,_1904 – February_20_,_1985 ) was an_American_voice_actor . He was_best_known for the_Disney_cartoon_character_Donald_Duck , whose_distinctive_voice he provided for 51_years , also_known as the_voice of Daisy_Duck in 1940 . He was_born in the_rural_community of Watonga , Oklahoma , and a_street in that_town is_named in his_honor . In 1993 , he was_posthumously_made a_Disney_Legend for his_contributions to Walt_Disney_films .
